CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR( AND( $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission,RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'NDA', OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Author Contract"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Review"))), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing"))),
AND( $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission,RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NDA', OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Author Contract"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Review"))), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing")))), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Regenerate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Regenerate", "Regenerate"), "_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Regenerate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Regenerate", "Regenerate"), "_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Regenerate_Custom
